content: head in grey yarn starting at the tip of the nose mc with 3 single_crochet r1 3 increase 6 r2 1 increase 1 single_crochet * 9 r3 5 9 single_crochet 9 r6 1 increase 2 single_crochet * 12 r7 12 single_crochet 30 r14 15 30 single_crochet 30 this could be a good time to start stuffing the head r16 1 decrease 4 single_crochet * 24 r17 1 decrease 3 single_crochet * 18 r18 1 decrease 2 single_crochet * 12 r19 1 decrease 1 single_crochet * 6 fo nose in black yarn mc with 4 single_crochet r1 4 increase 8 r2 1 increase 1 single_crochet * 12 r3 1 increase 2 single_crochet * 16 r4 1 decrease 2 single_crochet * 12 r5 1 decrease 1 single_crochet * 9 fo i think i may have added a little bit of stuffing to the nose but do what looks right when sewing it to the stuffed head version 2013 02 07 4 of 7 ears make 2 in grey yarn mc with 5 single_crochet r1 5 increase 10 r2 6 increase 4 slip_stitch 16 r3 1 increase 1 single_crochet *6 4 slip_stitch 22 r4 1 slip_stitch to fo arms/legs in black yarn i suggest doing this part after the head and body pieces have been stuffed and sewn together so the sizing can be figured out nicely 1 braid 3 strands of black yarn together for a braid knotted at either end size it to the scale of your character it needs to be arm length on either side of the body plus enough to go through the upper portion of the body 2 take the crochet hook and push it into a gap on one side of the body where the arm should go work it around stuffing if needed then come out the other side from another good arm hole 3 put the braided arm piece in the hook and pull it gently through the body the arms can be evened out by pulling on one or the other as needed 4 repeat steps 1 3 for the legs may be slightly longer than arm length in step 2 tail in black yarn this is similar to how you did the arms/legs just use less long of a length of yarn instead of braiding the tail and then putting it through the body try and tie the start of the braid through a loop where you want the tail to be then braid until the desired length eyes in black yarn or embroidery floss embroider eyes onto the head before of after stuffing version 2013 02 07 5 of 7 croc size 3 75 hook body in dark green yarn we are starting at the base mc with 6 single_crochet r1 6 increase 12 r2 1
